## GridInitializerOptions interface

Base grid initializer options for every grid initializer

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface GridInitializerOptions extends PluginOptions 
```

|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [prefix](./grid.gridinitializeroptions.prefix.md) | <code>string</code> | Prefix that is applied to stored data |
